  • Analysis of CVE-2023-46214 + PoC

    18 Nov 2023

    CVE-2023-46214 is a Remote Code Execution (RCE) vulnerability found in Splunk Enterprise which was disclosed on November 16, 2023 in the Splunk security advisory SVD-2023-1104. The description of the vulnerability essentially states that Splunk Enterprise versions below 9.0.7 and 9.1.2 are not safely sanitizing user supplied extensible stylesheet language transformations...
